environment_variables.ANLTYPE: prefix that identifies the type of analysis
environment_variables.PATHENV: path to the directory containing EnvironmentalVariablesMCGA file
environment_variables.SCRIPTFILEPATH1: path to the first script file
environment_variables.SCRIPTFILEPATH2: path to the second script file
environment_variables.EXECFILEPATHMEM: path to the executable directory for a specific member
environment_variables.PBSDIRECTIVENAME1: PBS directive for the job name
environment_variables.PBSDIRECTIVENAME2: PBS directive for the job name
environment_variables.PBSOUTFILE1: PBS directive for the output file
environment_variables.PBSERRFILE1: PBS directive for the error file
environment_variables.PBSOUTFILE2: PBS directive for the output file
environment_variables.PBSERRFILE2: PBS directive for the error file
environment_variables.PBSDIRECTIVEARRAY: PBS directive for the array job
environment_variables.PBSEXECFILEPATH: PBS directive for the execution path
environment_variables.name: name of the GRADS data
environment_variables.julday2: julian day of the final forecast
environment_variables.ndays: number of days between analysis and final forecast
environment_variables.time1: date and time of the analysis
environment_variables.time2: date and time of the final forecast
environment_variables.GRHDATAOUT: path to the output directory for GRADS data
environment_variables.job_model: job ID for the GRADS script
environment_variables.job_model_id: job ID for the GRADS script
environment_variables.JOBID: job ID for the PBS job
